button.label: Copy
button.supertip: Copies properties, including size, position and rotation, of the selected shape.

menu.label: Apply
menu.supertip: Apply copied shape's properties to all selected shapes.

button.label: Position &and Size
button.supertip: Apply the top left position and the height and width of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: Top Left Position (&V)
button.supertip: Apply the top left position of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: &Top Position
button.supertip: Apply the top position of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: &Bottom Position
button.supertip: Apply the bottom position of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: Le&ft Position
button.supertip: Apply the left position of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: &Right Position
button.supertip: Apply the right position of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: &Center Position
button.supertip: Apply the center position of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: Mi&ddle Position
button.supertip: Apply the middle position of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: &Midpoint
button.supertip: Apply the midpoint position of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: &Height
button.supertip: Apply the height of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: &Width
button.supertip: Apply the width of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: &Size
button.supertip: Apply the height and width of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: R&otation
button.supertip: Apply the rotation of the copied shape to all selected shapes. Supports lines facing in the same direction.

button.label: Ad&justments
button.supertip: Apply the yellow-handle adjustments of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

button.label: Logo Si&ze
button.supertip: Apply the area of the copied shape to all selected shapes while maintaining their aspect ratio.

button.label: Text Mar&gins
button.supertip: Apply the text margins of the copied shape to all selected shapes.

menu.label: Conform
menu.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the chosen property of the first shape to all others.

button.label: &Top Position
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the top position of the first shape to all others.

button.label: &Bottom Position
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the bottom position of the first shape to all others.

button.label: Le&ft Position
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the left position of the first shape to all others.

button.label: &Right Position
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the right position of the first shape to all others.

button.label: &Center Position
button.supertip: Center selected shapes vertically against the first one selected.

button.label: Mi&ddle Position
button.supertip: Center selected shapes horizontally against the first one selected.

button.label: &Midpoint
button.supertip: Center selected shapes on the midpoint of the first one selected.

button.label: &Height
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the height of the first shape to all others.

button.label: &Width
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the width of the first shape to all others.

button.label: &Size
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the height and width of the first shape to all others.

button.label: R&otation
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the rotation of the first shape to all others.

button.label: Ad&justments
button.supertip: Select any number of shapes. Applies the yellow-handle adjustments of the first shape to all others.

button.label: Logo Si&ze
button.supertip: Select any number of images. Resizes all images to match the area of the first image while maintaining aspect ratios.

menu.label: Swap
menu.supertip: Swap the position of two selected shapes.

button.label: Midpoint (&W)
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the midpoint of each.

button.label: Top Left (&1)
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the top left corner of each.

button.label: Top Right (&2)
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the top right corner of each.

button.label: Bottom Left (&3)
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the bottom left corner of each.

button.label: Bottom Right (&4)
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the bottom right corner of each.

button.label: &Top
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the center top position of each.

button.label: &Bottom
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the center bottom position of each.

button.label: Le&ft
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the middle left position of each.

button.label: &Right
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the middle right position of each.

button.label: Mi&ddle
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the middle position of each.

button.label: &Center
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, anchoring on the center position of each.

button.label: Topmost / Bottommost (&Q)
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, maintaining the topmost edge and bottommost edge.

button.label: Leftmost / Rightmost (&A)
button.supertip: Swap two selected shapes, maintaining the leftmost edge and rightmost edge.

button.label: Clockwise
button.supertip: Rotate selected shapes by 0.3 degrees clockwise (for micro-adjustments).

button.label: CClockwise
button.supertip: Rotate selected shapes by 0.3 degrees counterclockwise (for micro-adjustments).

button.label: Straighten
button.supertip: Straighten selected shapes. Lines are made vertical or horizontal depending on their current orientation.

button.label: Vertically
button.supertip: Spread two or more shapes vertically with a specified gap between each. Supports shapes rotated 90 or 270 degrees.

button.label: Horizontally
button.supertip: Spread two or more shapes horizontally with a specified gap between each. Supports shapes rotated 90 or 270 degrees.

button.label: Measure Gap
button.supertip: Measure the vertical and horizontal gap between two shapes.

menu.label: Select Match
menu.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes that match the chosen property of the reference shape.

button.label: &Top
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes with the same top position.

button.label: &Bottom
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes with the same bottom position.

button.label: Le&ft
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes with the same left position.

button.label: &Right
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes with the same right position.

button.label: &Height
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes with the same height.

button.label: &Width
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes with the same width.

button.label: &Size
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes with the same height and width.

button.label: Logo Si&ze (Area)
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes with the same area.

button.label: Shape T&ype
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes that are the same shape type.

button.label: Shape Fi&ll
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes that have the same fill properties.

button.label: L&ine / Shape Outline
button.supertip: Select a shape. Selects all other shapes that have the same outline properties.

button.label: Connector
button.supertip: Add an elbow connector between two shapes.

button.label: NTD
button.supertip: Add a note-to-draft stamp.

button.label: Grid
button.supertip: Select a shape to act as a container. Creates a textbox grid inside the container, including top and left headers, with the specified number of columns, rows and gap size.

button.label: &Copy Chart Properties
button.supertip: Select a chart. Copies the chart's inner size and position. Slight adjustments may occur to make the properties pasteable.

button.label: Paste Plot Area Position &and Size
button.supertip: Apply the plot area size and position of the copied chart to all selected charts.

button.label: Paste Plot Area &Top Position
button.supertip: Apply the plot area top position of the copied chart to all selected charts.

button.label: Paste Plot Area &Bottom Position
button.supertip: Apply the plot area bottom position of the copied chart to all selected charts.

button.label: Paste Plot Area Le&ft Position
button.supertip: Apply the plot area left position of the copied chart to all selected charts.

button.label: Paste Plot Area &Right Position
button.supertip: Apply the plot area right position of the copied chart to all selected charts.

button.label: Paste Plot Area &Height
button.supertip: Apply the plot area height of the copied chart to all selected charts.

button.label: Paste Plot Area &Width
button.supertip: Apply the plot area width of the copied chart to all selected charts.
